body:
... in order to not break the installation of older versions.
I hope this fixes [issue 15423](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/15423)

Also adjusting dealii package to just explicitly set GO if trilinos >= 12.18.1 is installed and use the old default otherwise.

Maybe this is a good chance to also merge [pull request 14215](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/14215)
title: trilinos: setting old GO default values for older trilinos versions
